cast.name: 乔纳斯·梅卡斯 Jonas Mekas

this_title: Matinee mit Jonas Mekas - Zu Gast: Jonas Mekas und Douglas Gordon
introduction: Conversation with Jonas Mekas and Douglas Gordon as pioneer filmmaker Mekas receives the honorary lifetime achievement prize B3 BEN Award at the B3 Biennale des bewegten Bildes, in Frankfurt, Germany, on December 3, 2017.
chinese_title: Matinee mit Jonas Mekas - Zu Gast: Jonas Mekas und Douglas Gordon
